import React from 'react'; import { FaLinkedin, FaGithub } from 'react-icons/fa'; function ContactForm() { const send = () => { setTimeout(() => { window.open("mailto:jacobhenryhoss2@gmail.com?subject=From " + document.getElementById("name").value + ": " + document.getElementById("subject").value + "&body=" + document.getElementById("message").value); }, 320); } return ( <>
) } export default ContactForm;
